title.rendered: AILIHEN C8 Foldable Headphones with Microphone and Volume Control Lightweight Stereo Headsets for iPad 3.5mm Android…

content.rendered:
Lightweight and Portable

Easy to hold, simple to retailer, gives portability and simplicity. The plush round ear cups fold up within the palm of your hand, it additionally light-weight so you’ll be able to convey them wherever life takes you, on or off a tour

Enjoy Your Music Tour

Powerful audio efficiency with a deep bass response and sculpted highs allow you to hear music the way in which it was initially heard. They sit over your ears with out falling off, get pleasure from your music whereas on the go

Stay Productive, Stay within the Zone

Headphones are nice in some ways — they aid you concentrate on what you might be doing and get nearer to your music. Keep the music going, and keep productive all day

Read more

Custom Comfort

Adopting premium pillow smooth earmuff offering exceedingly comfy over lengthy listening classes. The comfort-cushion ear cups buffer exterior noise for immersive sound so you’ll be able to expertise music the way in which it was meant to be heard with none discomfort.

The Nylon Braided Cord

The wire has quantity management and mic button that you should use to pause or play, change between tracks, and take incoming calls. A nylon coated audio cable is proof against tangling and holds up properly to reasonable abuse.

Your Best Road Trip Partner

The headphones are foldable, which makes it quite simple to retailer or take them with you when touring. If you wish to interact with your music, they’re completely price testing.

Read more

Make certain this matches by getting into your mannequin quantity.
Folding Design: Take your headphones wherever you go, simply fold them up, it’s good for journey and storage.
Hands-free Calling And Volume Control: Built-in mic and distant quantity management helps you to choose up calls and skip tracks or scenes in your gadgets.
Adjustable Hinge: The adjustable headband provides your headphones some spectacular flexibility, which is good for just about any sized head.
Noise Isolation: 40mm drivers, on-ear development isolates noise from exterior, so you’ll be able to hear the deep bass, and crisp mids and highs of your upcoming songs.
Board Compatibility: Compatible with iPad, smartphones, laptops, PCs, CD gamers, PSP, tablets, MP3, MP4, and different 3.5mm jack audio gadgets.
